craftingtable.description: Craftingtable is used to craft things.

flintsteel.description: Flintsteel is used to blow things up.

chest.description: Chest is used to store things.

pickaxe.description: Pickaxe is used to pick the dirt to axe.

hammer.description: Hammer is used to build dirt.

paper.description: Paper is used to draw things.

firework.description: Firework is used to work fire.

stone.description: Stones are found on the ground.

sword.description: Sword is used to hit things.

bow.description: Bow is used to poke things.
